name: Microtuning Support
description: Microtuning functionality supporting both Scala files (.scl/.kbm) and MTS (MIDI Tuning Standard) for custom tuning systems. Files can be loaded from MicroSD card or received via MIDI SysEx.

parameters.name: Microtuning
parameters.description: Selects the microtuning system to use.

parameters.name: Scala .scl
parameters.description: Scala scale file selection. Special value 'From SysEx' uses file sent over MIDI.

parameters.name: Scala .kbm
parameters.description: Scala keyboard mapping file selection. 'Automatic' generates mapping from Auto kbm parameters.

parameters.name: Auto kbm root
parameters.description: MIDI note number for automatic keyboard mapping root when Scala .kbm is set to 'Automatic'.

parameters.name: Auto kbm Hz
parameters.description: Frequency for automatic keyboard mapping root note when Scala .kbm is set to 'Automatic'.

parameters.name: MTS .syx
parameters.description: MTS SysEx dump file selection. 'From SysEx' uses tuning received over MIDI.
